New Zealand is set to fly a new flag. Check out some of the proposals.

By: Brandon Hundt

New Zealand is in the process of updating its flag. Our resident flag enthusiast weighs in on the choices.

Read the full post on PRI.org

I'm Brandon and I live in the Twin Cities of Minnesota. You'll typically find me exploring the intersection of design, geography, and sports. In other words, I like flags and maps.

During the weekday, I'm the Director of Technical Product Management for PRX, working on PRX Dovetail and the website for The World from PRX.

I have written for PRI.org and City Pages (RIP).
